SELECT ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as specName, ic.created_time as createTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname FROM items_comments as ic LEFT JOIN users as u on ic.user_id = u.id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, img.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img img ON i.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT items_spec.item_id, MIN(items_spec.price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE img.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
ORDER BY -- k:默认排序 -- c:销量排序 -- p:价格排序
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, img.url as imgUrl, tempSpec.price_discount as price FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img img ON i.id = img.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT items_spec.item_id, MIN(items_spec.price_discount) as price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE img.is_main = 1 AND i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId} ORDER BY -- k:默认排序 -- c:销量排序 -- p:价格排序
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
